metadata.title: USN-5032-1 -- Docker vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Several vulnerabilities were fixed in Docker. This update provides a new upstream version that fixed them.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5032-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  golang-github-docker-docker-dev - 20.10.7-0ubuntu1~20.04.1 docker.io - 20.10.7-0ubuntu1~20.04.1 golang-docker-dev - 20.10.7-0ubuntu1~20.04.1 vim-syntax-docker - 20.10.7-0ubuntu1~20.04.1 docker-doc - 20.10.7-0ubuntu1~20.04.1 No subscription required
